com.yy.transvod.player.opengles

类 EGLSurfaceTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yy.transvod.player.opengles.EGLSurfaceTexture
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.SurfaceTexture.OnFrameAvailableListener, java.lang.Runnable

    public final class EGLSurfaceTexture
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.graphics.SurfaceTexture.OnFrameAvailableListener, java.lang.Runnable
    Generates a SurfaceTexture using EGL/GLES functions.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  EGLSurfaceTexture.GlException
      A runtime exception to be thrown if some EGL operations failed.
      static interface  EGLSurfaceTexture.SecureMode
      Secure mode to be used by the EGL surface and context.
      static interface  EGLSurfaceTexture.TextureImageListener
      Listener to be called when the texture image on SurfaceTexture has been updated.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int SECURE_MODE_NONE
      No secure EGL surface and context required.
      static int SECURE_MODE_PROTECTED_PBUFFER
      Creating a secure surface backed by a pixel buffer.
      static int SECURE_MODE_SURFACELESS_CONTEXT
      Creating a surfaceless, secured EGL context.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

      EGLSurfaceTexture(android.os.Handler handler, EGLSurfaceTexture.TextureImageListener callback)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • EGLSurfaceTexture

        public EGLSurfaceTexture(android.os.Handler handler)
        参数:
        handler - The Handler that will be used to call SurfaceTexture.updateTexImage() to update images on the SurfaceTexture. Note that init(int) has to be called on the same looper thread as the Handler's looper.

      • EGLSurfaceTexture

        public EGLSurfaceTexture(android.os.Handler handler,
                         EGLSurfaceTexture.TextureImageListener callback)
        参数:
        handler - The Handler that will be used to call SurfaceTexture.updateTexImage() to update images on the SurfaceTexture. Note that init(int) has to be called on the same looper thread as the looper of the Handler.
        callback - The EGLSurfaceTexture.TextureImageListener to be called when the texture image on SurfaceTexture has been updated. This callback will be called on the same handler thread as the handler.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        public void init(@EGLSurfaceTexture.SecureMode
                 int secureMode)
        Initializes required EGL parameters and creates the SurfaceTexture.
        参数:
        secureMode - The EGLSurfaceTexture.SecureMode to be used for EGL surface.

      • release

        public void release()
        Releases all allocated resources.

      • getSurfaceTexture

        public android.graphics.SurfaceTexture getSurfaceTexture()
        Returns the wrapped SurfaceTexture. This can only be called after init(int).

      • onFrameAvailable

        public void onFrameAvailable(android.graphics.SurfaceTexture surfaceTexture)
        指定者:
        onFrameAvailable 在接口中 android.graphics.SurfaceTexture.OnFrameAvailableListener

        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
